caption.p: Grouping and treatments of the experimental animal.

tr.td: Normal control group administered with normal saline for 6 weeks.
Diabetic untreated group was induced with 150 mg/kg bwt of alloxan and was given normal saline for 6 weeks.
Diabetic untreated rats for 2 weeks; diabetic rats were then administrated with the 250 mg/kg bodyweight of A. conyzoides for 4 weeks.
Diabetic untreated rats for 2 weeks; diabetic rats were then administrated with the 500 mg/kg bodyweight of A. conyzoides for 4 weeks.
